title: Citi Guatemala Organizes Solutions Fair
summary: Guatemala City - For the third year in a row, as part of Citi's global commitment to promoting responsible finances, Citi Guatemala held a "Solutions Fair" to offer credit card clients behind on their payments options for paying off their debts.
tag-3: Guatemala City – For the third year in a row, as part of Citi's global commitment to promoting responsible finances, Citi Guatemala held a "Solutions Fair" to offer credit card clients behind on their payments options for paying off their debts.
tag-4: The fair was held on March 15 and 16 on the fifth floor of the Unicentro building. Citi Guatemala offered its clients a range of options for settling unpaid credit card bills or accounts under collection, including payment plans, discounts, waiver of late payment penalties and immediate and personalized service.
tag-5: "Financial responsibility is one of the things we are committed to at Citi," explained Bernardo Chacín, Citi Guatemala CCO. "To this end, we offer our clients transparent, simple and innovative products and services, as well as comprehensive solutions for resolving their debts."
tag-6: More than 500 Citi clients attended the fair. "We had run up a very high debt because of illness, and Citi offered us a good payment solution," remarked Marlon P., a Citi credit card client present at the event. "I think the Solutions Fair is a fabulous option for those of us who have suffered setbacks and have never been in this situation before."
tag-7: Citi clients who were not able to attend the Solutions Fair are invited to call 1724 for more information.
tag-8: "At Citi, we are committed to our clients. We know that getting out of debt is a goal within reach but that it takes time, discipline and a positive attitude. Making a budget, keeping up to date with credit and loan payments, and putting a little bit more each month into savings are the ways to achieve financial peace of mind and improve one's credit history," said Jorge Mario Ruiz, Sales and Distribution Manager, Citi Guatemala.
tag-9: Citi's Solutions Fair offered financial tips based on "The ABCs of Financial Education," a guide published by Guatemala's Superintendence of Banking. Participants also received advice on managing their finances. For more information, please visit: http://financialeducation.citi.com/citi/financialeducation/curriculum/index_sp.htm
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
